desc.cn: ATAC（Arguably a Terminal API Client）是一款可以说是终端中的 API 客户端。它借鉴了诸如 Postman、Insomnia 甚至 Bruno 等知名客户端的设计理念，但完全运行在终端中，无需图形界面环境。
desc.en: ATAC is Arguably a Terminal API Client. It is based on well-known clients such as Postman, Insomnia, or even Bruno, but inside your terminal without any specific graphical environment needed.

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew tap julien-cpsn/atac && \
brew install atac

linux/brew.cmd:
brew tap julien-cpsn/atac && \
brew install atac

fedora/dnf.cmd:
sudo dnf copr enable joxcat/atac && \
sudo dnf install atac
